model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The model that represents the board. Boards are a w*h grid of TileContainers Boards also keep track of the tile probabilies, and can generate a random tile given these probabilities
    Author:
    jesse

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(LevelState l)
      Construct a new board based off of the given LevelState the board gets all tile nums in the state it also reads multiplier and tile probabilities It then constructs the board appropriately

    • Method Detail

      • getH

        public int getH()
        Returns:

      • getW

        public int getW()
        Returns:
        the width of the board

      • getTileContainers

        public AbstractTileContainer[][] getTileContainers()
        Returns:
        a two dimensional array of the TileContainers in the board

      • getRandomTile

        public Tile getRandomTile()
        Generates a random tile given the tile probabilities this is used when a new tile falls from the top of the level
        Returns:
        a new random tile

      • settleTiles

        public void settleTiles()
        After a move, some tiles may have been used up or cleared. Calling this method lets gravity fill these empty slots by dropping the higher tiles into them. When a new tile is needed to fall from he top, the board generates a new random tile to fill the slot After this method is called, no TileContainer should be empty
